title: Double Feature Drive In Shockproof & The Dark Past

sources.title: Double Feature Drive In Shockproof & The Dark Past
sources.description: The Gorilla Mystery (1930) NOT RATED - Directed by Burt Gillett (uncredited) , With Walt Disney (voice) , Marcellite Garner (voice) , Purv Pullen (uncredited) A gorilla has escaped; Mickey, panicked, calls Minnie, but she plays a song to show she is not afraid. That is, until the gorilla comes up behind her and grabs her. Mickey rushes right over to save her. Shockproof (1949) RATED APPROVED - Directed by Douglas Sirk , with Cornel Wilde , Patricia Knight , John Baragrey A Parole Officer falls in-love with his client, a ravishing blonde who served time for murder, and he's determined to help her go straight despite her interfering criminal boyfriend. The Dark Past (1948) RATED PASSED - Directed by Rudolph Mat√© , with William Holden , Nina Foch , Lee J. Cobb An escaped psychopathic killer who takes the family and neighbors of police psychologist hostage reveals a recurring nightmare to the doctor.
